message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You can take the smaller share, I'll take the bigger one. It's a good starting point for negotiations!
I'm willing to give you a slightly bigger share, but I still think I deserve a bit more. Let's meet in the middle!
You're getting closer to my target, but I'm still not satisfied. Can you give me a bit more?
I'm not willing to give up more, let's meet at the 50/50 mark again. It's a fair and reasonable split!
